proposal: Hey there, Radiant DAO community! With 77601 holders trusting your mission to unify fragmented liquidity across Web3 money markets, we can see you're onto something big. Ever thought of deploying your own DEX or Lottery as a new revenue share tool? Or maybe a DAO to further decentralize your protocol? It's as easy as locking $RDNT liquidity.
